fatSeparators.title: Professional Grease Trap Cleaning and Disposal
fatSeparators.description: Regular maintenance of grease traps for restaurants, cafes and food production facilities. We prevent clogs, fines and unpleasant odors. Complete disposal cycle with environmental certificates.

sewerCleaning.title: High-Pressure Sewer Cleaning from Grease
sewerCleaning.description: Effective removal of grease deposits in pipes using modern high-pressure equipment. We eliminate clogs of any complexity without damaging communications.

biomethane.title: Grid-quality Biomethane (bioCH₄) for Energy and Transport
biomethane.description: We produce environmentally friendly biomethane with 96-97.4% CH₄ concentration for injection into the gas network and vehicle refueling. Certification according to RED II, ISCC, GoO standards.

fullCycle.title: Full Processing Cycle
fullCycle.description: From waste collection to energy and fertilizer production - a closed cycle without losses.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How often should grease traps be cleaned?
faq.a1: The frequency of grease trap cleaning depends on the intensity of use. For high-traffic restaurants and cafes, cleaning is recommended every 2-4 weeks. For establishments with lower loads - once every 1-2 months. Our specialists will help determine the optimal maintenance schedule for your business.
faq.q2: What waste is suitable for biomethane production?
faq.a2: Various types of organic waste are suitable for biomethane production: food waste from restaurants and cafes, used oils and fats, food industry waste, agricultural waste. Our technology allows efficient processing of mixed organic waste with high fat and oil content.
faq.q3: What is the cost of sewer cleaning services?
faq.a3: The cost of sewer cleaning services depends on several factors: pipe diameter and length, degree of contamination, accessibility of communications. We offer individual cost calculation after inspecting the site. For a preliminary estimate, please contact us by phone or fill out the form on the website.
faq.q4: Do you work with municipal enterprises?
faq.a4: Yes, we actively cooperate with municipal enterprises and government institutions. Our company has all the necessary licenses and certificates to work with government customers. We offer special conditions for long-term cooperation and comprehensive maintenance of municipal facilities.
